channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fired feds, Trump lovers and veterans: Meet the people applying for ICE jobs
item.description: At a recent DHS career expo in Provo, Utah, many attendees hoped to get hired to help with the Trump administration's deportation efforts.

item.title: Trump's Tylenol warning echoes past misconceptions about mothers and autism
item.description: Medical scholars say, efforts to find a singular cause for autism has historically led to scrutinizing parents and fueling stigma about autism

item.title: What schools stand to lose in the battle over the next federal education budget
item.description: Education researchers warn budget proposals from the White House and House Republicans would impose steep cuts on some of the nation's most vulnerable...

item.title: There was no rapture this week, so the quiz returns. Can you score a perfect 11?
item.description: This week, Jimmy Kimmel returned, a weird statue vanished and no one (to our knowledge) got snatched up to heaven.

item.title: Trump's TikTok deal payment criticized as 'shake-down scheme' by experts
item.description: The U.S. government will collect a multibillion-dollar fee from the American investors who will take over TikTok. Some experts call the fee and other ...

item.title: Trump’s New Tariffs Shock Countries Reeling From His Chaotic Trade War
item.description: Throughout Asia, the source of about 40 percent of U.S. imports, countries have little to show for weeks of talks trying to finalize deals.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From Trump’s Securing of an Indictment Against Comey
item.description: The president’s pressure on the Justice Department to charge one of his highest-profile retribution targets could have profound consequences.

item.title: James Comey, Former FBI Director, Indicted After Pressure From Trump
item.description: The move came after the president intensified his pressure campaign on the Justice Department in recent days, publicly demanding that top officials pr...

item.title: A Norm-Shattering Indictment, and Amazon’s $2.5 Billion Settlement
Kneecap Rapper’s Terrorism Charge Is Dismissed by U.K. Court
item.description: A rapper in the popular Irish-language group was charged over displaying a Hezbollah flag onstage.

item.title: Israel Is Flattening Areas of Gaza City
item.description: The city had been spared from widespread demolitions during previous military operations there. This time is different.

item.title: Israel’s isolation deepens with a wave of recognitions of Palestinian statehood.

item.title: Netanyahu Addresses the U.N. as Gaza War Nears Two-Year Mark
